name: Incline Bench Reverse Fly
how_to_perform:
1. Start by sitting on an incline bench with your feet flat on the floor.
2. Lean back slightly and engage your core to maintain a stable position throughout the exercise.

3. Hold a dumbbell or resistance band in each hand, keeping your arms extended towards the ceiling at shoulder height.

4. Keeping your arms straight and at shoulder height, press the dumbbells together, squeezing your shoulders blades together.

5. Release back to the starting position.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, focusing on precise control through the full range of motion.
short_summary: Incline bench reverse fly is an exercise that isolates and strengthens the Rhomboids.
